title: Basic Architectural Design Workshop Using Virtual Design Studio

context.prior_knowledge: Basic architectural terminology and experience with CAD software
context.additional_context: Project-based problem-solving in a virtual collaboration environment using personal devices (BYOD) to address real-world architectural challenges.

learning_goals: Learners can complete 3D architectural modeling projects using Virtual Design Studio (VDS) tools.
Learners can exchange real-time feedback with team members on online collaboration platforms to improve designs.
Learners can apply sustainable architectural design concepts reflecting local cultural contexts.

resources: Personal Devices with Installed Rhino 3D/Revit Licenses

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
